entry.title: Humanities + Digital at the Stanford Humanities Center
entry.content: On May 5, 2015, the Stanford Humanities Center hosted a panel discussion featuring Zephyr Frank, Elaine Treharne, Paula Finland, Karl Grossner, Brian Johnsrud, and Jason Heppler. The webcast was recorded live at SHC where the scholars and experts discussed how digital tools are helping them explore complex questions in history, literature, archeology, and more.
